import {Component} from '@angular/core'; import {HttpClient} from '@angular/common/http'; import { SymbolSearchServiceService } from './symbol-search-service.service'; import {Observable} from "rxjs"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent{ title = 'Homework4'; starter_url = 'https://www.alphavantage.co/query?function='; search_starter_url = 'https://www.alphavantage.co/query?function=SYMBOL_SEARCH&keywords='; stock_symbol = ''; url = ''; api_key = 'XGN36Q0ICTGL1ZWD'; show_chart = false; chartData: Object = []; serch_results: Observable; constructor(private http: HttpClient, public symbolSearchService: SymbolSearchServiceService, ) { } // used to access the service methods generateStockUrl(){ // console.log("generateStockUrl() called"); this.url = this.starter_url + 'TIME_SERIES_INTRADAY&symbol=' + this.stock_symbol + '&interval=5min&apikey=' + this.api_key; // console.log("URL", this.url) this.http.get(this.url).subscribe((data) => { this.chartData = data; console.log("CHART DATA: ", this.chartData); this.show_chart = true; }); } symbol_search(input : string){ let final_search_url = this.search_starter_url + input + '&apikey=' + this.api_key; console.log("input: ", input) this.sear } }
